tool_description: Flight status, on-time performance and statistics by Flightera
title: Flightera Flight Data

api_list.name: flightSearch
api_list.description:
Returns a list of flights for a given flight number. Minimum and/or maximum date can optionally be specified to limit the search. Results are ordered by departure date ascending. The next departure time is returned for pagination.
Will return a 400 if the date range requested is outside the subscription level

schema.description: FlightSearchResponses contains flights search responses and the next time, to be used for pagination

flights.description: A list of flights returned by the search

items.description: FlightSearchResult contains one flight search response

arrival_ident.description: The Identifier of the arrival airport

date.description: The date of the flight in local time of the departure airport

departure_ident.description: The Identifier of the departure airport

flnr.description: The Flight Number in Upper Case

status.description: Status of the flight, one of: [live,scheduled,cancelled,landed,unknown]

next_time.description: The next time to be used for pagination

parameters.name: flnr
parameters.description: The flight number to request

parameters.name: dtFrom
parameters.description: The minimum date to request

parameters.name: dtTo
parameters.description: The maximum date to request

utterances.utterance: Can you find the flight details for flight number AA123?
Show me the flights for flight number BA456 between 2023-05-01 and 2023-05-10.

Look up flight number LH654 for any flights after 2024-03-10.
Find flights for flight number EK202 within the date range 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-15.

Retrieve flight information for flight number SQ305 from 2023-09-20 to 2023-09-25.
I need the flight details for flight number AC789 for flights departing after 2023-10-10.

api_list.name: airlineSearch
api_list.description:
Returns a list of airlines for a given country, identifiers or name search pattern. Multiple arguments can be specified to limit the search.
Either one of the arguments must be specified.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com/airline/search"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

items.description: The AirlineSearchResult contains information about one airline

country.description: The country of the airline as a two letter code, if available

iata.description: The IATA code of the airline, if available

icao.description: The ICAO code of the airline, if available

ident.description: The Ident code of the airline

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name or part of the name of the airline, case insensitive

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code country code to request

utterances.utterance: Can you find airlines with the IATA code AA?
Show me airlines from the United States using the country code US.
List airlines that have 'Air' in their name.
Find airlines with the ICAO code DAL.
Get airlines from Germany using the country code DE.
Search for airlines with the name containing 'Express'.
Find airlines with the IATA code BA.
Show me airlines from Canada using the country code CA.
List airlines with the ICAO code AFR.
Find airlines with the name containing 'Jet'.

api_list.name: aircraftSearch
api_list.description:
A list of plane registrations for a given search criteria.
Can search by airline ident, country, model
If multiple arguments are provided, they will be chained as AND
Returns only currently active aircraft
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com/aircraft/search"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Model ICAO code

parameters.name: airline_ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Two letter country code

utterances.utterance: Show me all currently active aircraft models with the ICAO code B738.
List all active planes operated by the airline with ident AA.
Find all active aircraft registered in the United States.
Get a list of active aircraft for airline ident BA and model A320.
Which active aircraft are registered in Canada and have the model code CRJ9?
Show me active aircraft for airline ident LH that are registered in Germany.
List all active aircraft with model code E190 operated by airline ident AC.
Find active aircraft registered in Japan with model code B772.
Get all active aircraft operated by airline ident QF registered in Australia.
Show me all active aircraft with model code A350.

api_list.name: airportSearch
api_list.description:
Returns a list of airports for a given country, bbox or timezone. Multiple arguments can be specified to limit the search.
Either one of country, bbox or timezone must be specified.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com/airport/search"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

items.description: The AirportSearchResult contains basic information about one airport

iata.description: The IATA code of the airport, optional

icao.description: The ICAO code of the airport, optional

ident.description: The Ident code of the airport

local_id.description: The local id (e.g. FaaID) of the airport, optional

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone of the airport (e.g. Europe/Berlin)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code country code to request

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bbox (min Longitude , min Latitude , max Longitude , max Latitude), will restrict results to airports within that box

utterances.utterance: Can you list all airports in the country with the ISO code US?
Show me airports located within the bounding box defined by min longitude -74, min latitude 40, max longitude -73, max latitude 41.
Find airports in the timezone Europe/Berlin.
List airports in the country with the ISO code JP.
Get airports within the bounding box with coordinates min longitude 2, min latitude 48, max longitude 3, max latitude 49.
Show airports in the timezone America/New_York.
Find airports in the country with the ISO code BR.
List airports within the bounding box min longitude 10, min latitude 50, max longitude 11, max latitude 51.
Get airports located in the timezone Asia/Tokyo.
Show me airports in the country with the ISO code CA.

api_list.name: airportInfo
api_list.description:
Returns detailed airport information for airports identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry.
However, due to the nature of the data, it is possible that multiple entries are returned.
If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com/airport/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

items.description: The AirportInfoResult contains information about one airport

city.description: The city of the airport, optional

country.description: The country of the airport as a two letter code

iata.description: The IATA code of the airport, optional

icao.description: The ICAO code of the airport, optional

ident.description: The Ident code of the airport

local_id.description: The local id (e.g. FaaID) of the airport, optional

operator.description: The operator of the airport, optional

owner.description: The owner of the airport, optional

pos_lat.description: The latitude of the airport, optional

pos_lng.description: The longitude of the airport, optional

public.description: Indication whether the airport is publicly owned, optional

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airport, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: localID
parameters.description: Local identifiers of the airport, currently mostly available for the US & CA (FAA-ID). Max length is 6

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airport, must have a length of 3

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

A list of plane registrations for a given airline. Can search by ident only.
Only returns currently active aircraft

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

api_list.name: flightStatistics
api_list.description:
Returns statistics for a flight number with one entry per route flown. Statistics are updated daily.
The query can be filtered by route.
Statistics are always as of today, please contact us if you require historical statistics.

items.description: FlightStatResult is one element returned by Flight Statistics call

acft_models.description: A list of icao codes for aircrafts flown on this route within the past 30 days

avg_delay.description: Average delay of flights within the past 30 days

avg_duration.description: Average duration in hours of flights within the past 30 days (excludes cancelled flights)

callsign.description: Callsign of this flight, if available

cancelled_30d.description: Percentage of flights cancelled within the past 30 days

count_30d.description: Number of flights within the past 30 days

delay_30d.description: Percentage of flights delayed (15min+ at arrival) within the past 30 days

flnr.description: The Flight Number in Upper Case

last_flight.description: Date of the last flight on our record

parameters.name: flnr
parameters.description: The flight number to request

parameters.name: aptFrom
parameters.description: Departure airport ident

parameters.name: aptTo
parameters.description: Arrival airport ident

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the flight statistics for flight number AA123?
Show me the on-time performance data for flight number BA456 from Heathrow to JFK.
I need the latest statistics for flight number DL789.
Get the flight statistics for flight number UA321 departing from San Francisco International Airport.
Provide the daily updated statistics for flight number LH654 arriving at Frankfurt Airport.
What are the on-time performance stats for flight number QF12 flying from Sydney to Los Angeles?
Give me the flight statistics for flight number EK202.
I want to see the performance data for flight number AF345 from Charles de Gaulle to New York JFK.
Retrieve the latest statistics for flight number SQ22.
Show me the flight stats for flight number BA789 arriving at London Gatwick.

api_list.name: airlineStatistics
api_list.description:
Returns detailed airline statistics for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com/airline/statistics"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

schema.description: The AirlineStatsResult contains statistics about airlines

average_delay_30_days.description: The average delay of delayed flights over the past 30 days, in minutes

average_plane_age.description: The average age of planes in the fleet in years, rounded down

cancel_percentage_30_days.description: The percentage of flights cancelled over the past 30 days

delay_percentage_30_days.description: The percentage of flights delayed over the past 30 days

flights_30_days.description: The number of flights of the airline in the past 30 days

flights_7_days.description: The number of flights of the airline in the past 7 days

newest_plane_age.description: Age of the newest plane in the fleet in years, rounded down

oldest_plane_age.description: Age of the oldest plane in the fleet in years, rounded down

top_airports_30_days.description:
The top airports of the airline in the past 30 days with number of flights over the past 30 days
Note that this dictionary is not sorted

top_countries_30_days.description:
The top countries of the airline in the past 30 days with number of flights over the past 30 days
Note that this dictionary is not sorted

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

Get the airline statistics for the airline identified by the ident 'SWA'.
Provide the current day's airline statistics for the airline with ICAO code DLH.

api_list.name: flightInfo
api_list.description: Returns the info for a flight on a specified date, or the current flight if date is omitted. Will return a 400 if the date requested is outside the subscription level

items.description: The FlightInfoResult contains information about a single flight

actual_arrival_is_estimated.description: True if the actual departure time is estimated

actual_arrival_local.description: Actual or Estimated departure time in Local Time

actual_arrival_utc.description: Actual or Estimated departure time in UTC

actual_departure_is_estimated.description: True if the actual departure time is estimated

actual_departure_local.description: Actual or Estimated departure time in Local Time

actual_departure_utc.description: Actual or Estimated departure time in UTC

airline_iata.description: AirlineIATA is the IATA code of the airline

airline_icao.description: AirlineICAO is the ICAO code of the airline

airline_name.description: AirlineName is the name of the airline

arrival_baggage.description: Baggage contains information on baggage for arrival

arrival_city.description: The city of the arrival airport

arrival_gate.description: The gate of the arrival airport

arrival_iata.description: The IATA code of the arrival airport

arrival_icao.description: The ICAO code of the arrival airport

arrival_name.description: The name of the arrival airport

arrival_terminal.description: The terminal of the arrival airport

date.description: The date of the flight in local time of the departure airport

departure_checkin.description: The checkin counter of the departure airport

departure_city.description: The city of the departure airport

departure_gate.description: The gate of the departure airport

departure_iata.description: The IATA code of the departure airport

departure_icao.description: The ICAO code of the departure airport

departure_name.description: The name of the departure airport

departure_terminal.description: The terminal of the departure airport

family.description: The model family in plain text

flnr.description: The Flight Number in Upper Case

model.description: ICAO Code of the aircraft model

reg.description: The ICAO code of the aircraft

scheduled_arrival_local.description: Scheduled departure Time in Local Time

scheduled_departure_local.description: Scheduled departure Time in Local Time

status.description: Status of the flight, one of: [live,sched,canc,landed,unknown,diverted]

parameters.name: flnr
parameters.description: The flight number to request

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date, if omitted the current flight will be returned

api_list.name: airportMetar
api_list.description:
Returns the most recent METAR for an airport specified by the given ident.
Includes a parsed version of the METAR.

schema.description: The AirportMetar object contains parsed metar for an airport

clouds.description: A list of parsed cloud levels

items.description: CloudElement contains information about cloud level

coverage.description: Coverage indicator as provided in the metar

date.description: Date and time of the METAR

weather_elements.description: A list of parsed weather elements

descriptor.description: The descriptor as provided in the metar

wind_measure.description: Wind measurement units for wind_speed and wind_gusts

wind_variable_from.description: For variable Wind, from value for the wind direction

wind_variable_to.description: For variable Wind, to value for the wind direction

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport (e.g. as returned by /airport/search)

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the latest METAR report for JFK airport?
Show me the most recent METAR for LAX airport.
I need the current METAR data for Heathrow Airport, ident EGLL.
Get the latest weather METAR for Tokyo Haneda Airport with ident RJTT.

api_list.name: airportDelayDailyStatistics
api_list.description:
Returns detailed daily delay statistics for an airport identified by the provided identifiers. If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided. Additionally, `dt` and `isDeparture` are required.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the data for the specific date.

schema.description: The AirportDelayDaily contains daily delay statistics for an airport

date.description: Date for which the delay statistics are provided

flightsDelayed15To30.description: The number of flights that were delayed between 15 to 30 minutes on the given date

flightsDelayed30To45.description: The number of flights that were delayed between 30 to 45 minutes on the given date

flightsDelayed45To60.description: The number of flights that were delayed between 45 to 60 minutes on the given date

flightsDelayedOver60.description: The number of flights that were delayed for more than 60 minutes on the given date

flightsDelayedUnknown.description: The number of flights with unknown delay durations on the given date

flightsOnTime.description: The number of flights that were on time on the given date

isDeparture.description: Flag indicating if the statistics are for departures (true) or arrivals (false)

numFlightsCancelled.description: The number of flights that were cancelled at the airport on the given date

numFlightsLanded.description: The number of flights that landed at the airport on the given date

parameters.name: isDeparture
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the desired statistics are for departures (true) or arrivals (false)

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: The date for which delay statistics are desired, formatted as "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

Show me the arrival delay statistics for the airport identified as KORD on 2024-04-15.

Show arrival delay statistics for the airport with ident EHAM on 2024-05-20.

api_list.name: airportFlights
api_list.description:
Returns a list of flights for an airport, direction and time. The list is sorted ascending by scheduled departure time for direction=="departure" and sorted descending by scheduled arrival time for direction=="arrival".
The next departure/arrival time is returned for pagination.
The dates returned for each flight represent the scheduled departure date in local time and can be used to query flight data via /flight/info.

schema.description: FlightSearchResponses contains flights search responses and the next time, to be used for pagination

flights.description: A list of flights returned by the search

items.description: FlightSearchResult contains one flight search response

arrival_ident.description: The Identifier of the arrival airport

date.description: The date of the flight in local time of the departure airport

departure_ident.description: The Identifier of the departure airport

flnr.description: The Flight Number in Upper Case

status.description: Status of the flight, one of: [live,scheduled,cancelled,landed,unknown]

next_time.description: The next time to be used for pagination

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction, one of "arrival", "departure"

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: Ident of the airport to request. Ident is the unique identifier as returned by /airport/search or /airport/info endpoints.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Timestamp in UTC. If direction is "arrival", show flights with scheduled arrival time prior to this timestamp. If direction is "departure", show flights with scheduled departure time after this timestamp. Expected in any valid format, such as 2022-01-01T12:00:00.000Z. Maximum range of flights returned is 30 days.

parameters.name: counterpart_ident
parameters.description: Ident of the counterpart airport (destination if direction=arrival, otherwise arrival). Used to query connections on a defined route. Ident is the unique identifier as returned by /airport/search or /airport/info endpoints.

api_list.name: aircraftInfo
api_list.description:
Returns detailed aircraft information for an aircraft identified by registration.
Only works for currently active aircraft

schema.description: The AircraftResult contains information about one aircraft

first_flight.description: First flight date of that aircraft, if available

hex.description: The ICAO code of the aircraft, if available

is_cargo.description: Indicates if the aircraft is a cargo plane

last_flight.description: Last flight date, scheduled departure in UTC

last_flight_number.description: Last flight number of the aircraft

ln.description: Line number of the aircraft, if available

model.description: Model ICAO code of the aircraft

msn.description: Manufacturer's serial number of the aircraft, if available

seat_config.description:
Seat configuration of the aircraft. The returned value is a map of seat codes to number of seats.
The codes are one of: F (first class), C (business class), Y (economy class), W (economy plus). Empty for cargo planes

parameters.name: reg
parameters.description: The registration of the aircraft, as returned by /airline/aircraft or /aircraft/search

utterances.utterance: Can you provide detailed information about the aircraft with registration N12345?
I need the aircraft details for the registration G-ABCD.

I want to know more about the aircraft registered as F-GHJK.
Retrieve detailed data for the aircraft with registration C-FABC.

api_list.name: airlineFlights
api_list.description:
Returns a list of flights for an airline given a start time. The list is sorted ascending by scheduled departure time.
The next departure/ time is returned for pagination (use start times to paginate).
The dates returned for each flight represent the scheduled departure date in local time and can be used to query flight data via /flight/info.

schema.description: FlightSearchResponses contains flights search responses and the next time, to be used for pagination

flights.description: A list of flights returned by the search

items.description: FlightSearchResult contains one flight search response

arrival_ident.description: The Identifier of the arrival airport

date.description: The date of the flight in local time of the departure airport

departure_ident.description: The Identifier of the departure airport

flnr.description: The Flight Number in Upper Case

status.description: Status of the flight, one of: [live,scheduled,cancelled,landed,unknown]

next_time.description: The next time to be used for pagination

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Timestamp in UTC. Shows flights with scheduled departure time after this timestamp. Expected in any valid format, such as 2022-01-01T12:00:00.000Z. Maximum range of flights returned is 30 days.

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: Ident of the airline to request. Ident is the unique identifier as returned by /airline/search or /airline/info endpoints.

utterances.utterance: Show me all flights for airline AA departing after 2023-07-01T08:00:00.000Z.

api_list.name: airlineInfo
api_list.description:
Returns detailed airline information for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry.
However, due to the nature of the data, it is possible that multiple entries are returned.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, name must be provided.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com/airline/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

items.description: The AirlineInfoResult contains information about one airline

alliance.description: Alliance of the airline, if available

callsign.description: The callsign of the airline, if available

country.description: The country of the airline as a two letter code, if available

end_date.description: The date the airline ceased operation, if available

founding_date.description: The founding date of the airline, if available

iata.description: The IATA code of the airline, if available

icao.description: The ICAO code of the airline, if available

ident.description: The Ident code of the airline

start_date.description: The date the airline started operation, if available

website.description: Website of the airline, if available

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the airline. Not case sensitive

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

utterances.utterance: Can you provide detailed information about the airline with the ICAO code AAL?
I want to know more about the airline named Lufthansa.
Give me the airline details for the airline with the IATA code DAL.
Show me detailed information for the airline identified by the ident code ABC123.
What can you tell me about the airline with ICAO code SWR?
Find airline details for the airline named Emirates.
I need information on the airline with IATA code QF.
Provide details for the airline with ident code XYZ789.
Can you get me the airline info for the ICAO code AFR?
Tell me about the airline named British Airways.

api_list.name: airportStatistics
api_list.description:
Returns detailed airport statistics for airports identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com/airport/statistics"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flightera-flight-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

schema.description: The AirportStatsResult contains detailed statistics for an airport

arrivals.description: The number of flights that arrived at the airport within the past 30 days

avg_arrival_distance.description: Average distance of arriving flights over the past 30 days

avg_delay_arrivals.description: Average delay of delayed arriving flights over the past 30 days. Only provided if meaningful.

avg_delay_departures.description: Average delay of delayed departing flights over the past 30 days. Only provided if meaningful.

avg_departure_distance.description: Average distance of departing flights over the past 30 days

cancelled_arrivals.description: Percentage of cancelled arrivals. Only provided if meaningful.

cancelled_departures.description: Percentage of cancelled departures. Only provided if meaningful.

delayed_arrivals.description: Percentage of delayed arrivals (delay > 10 minutes). Only provided if meaningful.

delayed_departures.description: Percentage of delayed departures (delay > 10 minutes). Only provided if meaningful.

departures.description: The number of flights that departed from the airport within the past 30 days

top_airlines.description: Top 5 airlines with number of flights within the past 30 days. Contains a map with airline identifier and number of flights

top_destinations.description: Top 10 destinations for departing flights with number of flights within the past 30 days. Contains a map with airport identifier and number of flights

top_sources.description: Top 10 sources for arriving flights with number of flights within the past 30 days. Contains a map with airport identifier and number of flights

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

parameters.name: localID
parameters.description: Local identifiers of the airport, currently mostly available for the US & CA (FAA-ID). Max length is 6

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airport, must have a length of 3

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airport, must have a length of 4

utterances.utterance: Can you provide detailed airport statistics for the airport with IATA code JFK?
Show me the current day's flight statistics for the airport identified by ICAO code EGLL.
I need detailed statistics for the airport with the local ID LAX.
Get the airport statistics for the airport with ident code SFO.
Please provide the flight status and on-time performance data for the airport with IATA code CDG.
Retrieve detailed airport statistics for the airport with ICAO code KORD.
Show me the current day's data for the airport identified by local ID BOS.
Can you get the airport statistics for the ident code MIA?
Provide detailed statistics for the airport with IATA code LHR.
I want to see the on-time performance and flight status for the airport with ICAO code YSSY.
